You can purchase an account region transfer within the client in the store. Hit the *Account* button in the store to see transfer options. Below are some screenshots to get you started.

(Click to Enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/mdnC1

You can also find more about transferring your account in [our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ). Let me know if this answered your question.
